subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored as Real Madrid beat Schalke, 2-0, in the Champions League, a game that saw Coach Carlo Ancelotti join the players on the field.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored as Real Madrid beat Schalke, 2-0, in the Champions League, a game that saw Coach Carlo Ancelotti join the players on the field.
